job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Within the Data Office, we have a team responsible for building impactful AI solutions. With these AI solutions, we help our business unit Schade & Inkomen to digitize important processes. An example of this is the digitization of our Claims processes. Your main goal is to deploy/roll out the AI solutions of your colleagues/the AI solution made together with your colleagues in a scalable and secure way., In the past year, we have set up various applications using LLMs and we are now looking for an experienced Machine Learning Engineer to further scale these applications and help build new AI solutions. You provide a clear vision of the required Cloud architecture and manage it for our AI solutions. With your solution-oriented and proactive mindset, you help the team scale and make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy. We work agile with colleagues from the business on projects that are often sprint-transcending.

   In concrete terms, you bring AI solutions to production so that your solutions really create value for our company of tomorrow. Exploring and applying new technology plays an important role. In addition, you actively contribute to innovation within NN. During our monthly innovation day, you investigate with your colleagues which new techniques are applicable within our company., The team you work with on a daily basis consists of a group of data scientists, a small group of software and machine learning professionals, and a program manager who oversees our activities. You will, of course, work closely with the team's data scientist, and together with these colleagues, we work with great enthusiasm and dedication every day to optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality.

   In addition, you are a member of the "Engineering" guild, where about 400 engineers meet each other. Here, you exchange knowledge and experiences with peers. We believe that every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa. This way, you accelerate your career and deliver maximum value with our AI solutions.

   Onze kantoren zijn 100% circulair gerenoveerd. Zero waste, maar zonder concessies te doen aan het ontwerp.

   Onze in-house 'event space' is hét creatieve centrum voor het delen van kennis.

   Bij NN werken we hybride. Samen met jouw team bepaal jij waar en wanneer je werkt.

   'Ýou Matter', dat is onze merkbelofte.

   Het kantoor is een ontmoetingsplek, met ruimte om te brainstormen en samen te werken.

   Ons hoofdkantoor ter gelegenheid van het event: 'Den Haag Stad Escher' in 2023.

   Wij delen dit graag met elkaar.

   Wij geloven in de kracht van kunst en zijn trotse partner van het Mauritshuis.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer

Within the Data Office, we have a team responsible for building impactful AI solutions. With these AI solutions, we help our business unit Schade & Inkomen to digitize important processes. An example of this is the digitization of our Claims processes. Your main goal is to deploy/roll out the AI solutions of your colleagues/the AI solution made together with your colleagues in a scalable and secure way., In the past year, we have set up various applications using LLMs and we are now looking for an experienced Machine Learning Engineer to further scale these applications and help build new AI solutions. You provide a clear vision of the required Cloud architecture and manage it for our AI solutions. With your solution-oriented and proactive mindset, you help the team scale and make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy. We work agile with colleagues from the business on projects that are often sprint-transcending.

   In concrete terms, you bring AI solutions to production so that your solutions really create value for our company of tomorrow. Exploring and applying new technology plays an important role. In addition, you actively contribute to innovation within NN. During our monthly innovation day, you investigate with your colleagues which new techniques are applicable within our company., The team you work with on a daily basis consists of a group of data scientists, a small group of software and machine learning professionals, and a program manager who oversees our activities. You will, of course, work closely with the team's data scientist, and together with these colleagues, we work with great enthusiasm and dedication every day to optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality.

   In addition, you are a member of the "Engineering" guild, where about 400 engineers meet each other. Here, you exchange knowledge and experiences with peers. We believe that every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa. This way, you accelerate your career and deliver maximum value with our AI solutions.

   Onze kantoren zijn 100% circulair gerenoveerd. Zero waste, maar zonder concessies te doen aan het ontwerp.

   Onze in-house 'event space' is hét creatieve centrum voor het delen van kennis.

   Bij NN werken we hybride. Samen met jouw team bepaal jij waar en wanneer je werkt.

   'Ýou Matter', dat is onze merkbelofte.

   Het kantoor is een ontmoetingsplek, met ruimte om te brainstormen en samen te werken.

   Ons hoofdkantoor ter gelegenheid van het event: 'Den Haag Stad Escher' in 2023.

   Wij delen dit graag met elkaar.

   Wij geloven in de kracht van kunst en zijn trotse partner van het Mauritshuis.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The role emphasizes deploying and scaling AI solutions, managing cloud architecture for AI, and productionizing models, aligning strongly with the 'ML Engineer' profile. While LLMs are mentioned, the core focus is on the engineering and operational aspects of bringing AI solutions to production rather than novel generative model development.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the creation and development of AI models or systems.
This highlights the goal of using technology to improve or automate business processes.
This specifies a particular business domain and process that AI solutions will impact.

job_tasks.phrase: deploy/roll out the AI solutions of your colleagues/the AI solution made together with your colleagues in a scalable and secure way
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the deployment and scaling of AI solutions in a production environment.
Scaling applications is a key aspect of MLOps and productionizing.
This indicates involvement in the creation or development of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: provide a clear vision of the required Cloud architecture and manage it for our AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: Managing cloud architecture for AI solutions is a core MLOps responsibility.
This describes an approach to tackling challenges and finding practical solutions.
Scaling is a fundamental MLOps task.

job_tasks.phrase: make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'production-worthy' directly relates to MLOps and preparing solutions for live environments.
This is a direct statement about putting AI solutions into a live, operational state.
This indicates a need to stay updated with and utilize emerging technologies.
This points to a proactive role in developing new ideas and approaches.

job_tasks.phrase: investigate with your colleagues which new techniques are applicable within our company
job_tasks.justification: This involves researching and evaluating new technologies for business application.

job_tasks.phrase: work with the team's data scientist
job_tasks.justification: Collaboration with other technical roles is implied.

job_tasks.phrase: optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality
job_tasks.justification: This describes the business outcomes and areas of improvement targeted by the AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: exchange knowledge and experiences with peers
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the importance of sharing information and learning from colleagues.

job_tasks.phrase: accelerate your career and deliver maximum value with our AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: This connects individual growth and contribution to the value generated by AI solutions for the business.

technologies.justification: LLMs are a type of generative model.
Cloud architecture refers to the design and management of cloud-based infrastructure.

soft_skills.justification: This describes a pragmatic and proactive approach to problem-solving.
This indicates a need for continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies.
This highlights a proactive and innovative mindset.

soft_skills.phrase: work with the team's data scientist
soft_skills.justification: Implies collaboration with other team members.

soft_skills.phrase: exchange knowledge and experiences with peers
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes knowledge sharing and collaboration within a community.
